title: Elegy for a Lost Star - Elizabeth Haydon
description:
Written by Elizabeth Haydon
Read by Erin Jones
Format: MP3
Unabridged

The dragon Anwyn - who has lain for three years in deathlike sleep in a grave of rock and black coal - is freed by the cataclysm that concluded Requiem for the Sun. Disoriented and confused, she remembers only two things: the person who trapped her in dragon form and locked her in the grave - Rhapsody - and an all-encompassing desire to wreak vengeance.

This is the fifth in the Symphony of Ages series. Like the others, I've cleaned up the audio, chapterized the book, and updated all the tags. This series is, for me, a test to see how much the community likes this sort of thing. If it gets a strong positive response, I've got tons of other books I've done the same thing too I'd love to share
